Gbenga Adeku bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe n'elu igwe, onye na-akwado gburugburu ebe obibi na mgbanwe ihu igwe.  A na-emepụta ihe osise ya site na mkpofu rọba iji mee ka a mara banyere ihe egwu dị na mkpofu plastik na gburugburu ebe obibi na mgbanwe ihu igwe.
A mụrụ Gbenga Adeku na Segun Adeku, onye na-ebi akwụkwọ nka ọdịnala ọhụrụ. Adeku nwetara nzere bachelọ na Fine and Applied Art na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Adeku rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya tupu ọ gbanwee gaa na nka plastik mgbe ọ zutere Dotun Popoola, onye na-akpụ ihe

Adeku chepụtara echiche nke nka plastik mgbe ọ chọpụtara na idei mmiri n'ógbè ya sitere na ihe mkpofu plastik na-egbochi ụzọ mmiri. Mgbe ahụ, ọ malitere ịnakọta karama anụ ụlọ na ite ihe ọṅụṅụ site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'obodo ya ma gbanwee ha ka ha bụrụ ihe osise iji mee ka a mara ihe mkpofu plastik iji chebe gburugburu ebe obibi na mgbanwe ihu igwe. N'afọ 2019, o hiwere nzukọ Xtetixupcycle lekwasịrị anya na imepụta mmata mgbanwe ihu igwe na ọzụzụ ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe n'elu
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya International Breweries Plc na Father's Love Forum Nigeria.
